MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD10 and TD11 postcode areas of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:23am. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a fault with our equipment in the Greenlaw area and due to the extent of the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 6pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:07am on Sunday, 28 March 2021
